website_summaries.verdict: You will pay higher initial cost, but if a sleek, modern look is what you want for your bathroom, this is a great choice.
pros: One-piece construction, silent-closure lid, quiet flush, quick refilling of tank
Water line can be placed on any side
cons: Installation can be difficult as holes need to be dug in the floor
professional installation is the way to go if you have porcelain tiles

customer_reviews.title: Good product but before order it just make sure it ...
customer_reviews.text: Good product but before order it just make sure it won't block your water valve, otherwise you have to move it and expect more plumbing work.
customer_reviews.author: Evgeny Chernousov

customer_reviews.title: Not a standard swap out
customer_reviews.text: Very cool looking product. Comfort height+ soft close seat+ had a bit of a snag finding a plumber for the swap out. But very happy with it
customer_reviews.author: Robert Humphries

customer_reviews.title: Great toilet. I had to move the water line ...
customer_reviews.text: Great toilet.I had to move the water line 3 inches to the left, but Looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Newchild Generation

customer_reviews.title: great looking but so so
customer_reviews.text: the product is big, so measure your area first. the flush is okay. the seat moves around a lot and when you tighten, it still loosens easily

customer_reviews.title: Great look Only negative is I've had to work with ...
customer_reviews.text: Great look Only negative is I've had to work with the tank filler as it would leak and refill nonstop

customer_reviews.title: I would like to change my first review on this item as ...
customer_reviews.text: I would like to change my first review on this item as i was confused between AMAZON and seller on exchange procedures. I am very happy with the seller and the item it looks great in our new remodeled bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Eischens

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This looks amazing in our master bathroom. it's very nice and the seat is actually comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Cinthia Paz

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful! Replaced a 1977 toilet and there have been ...
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful! Replaced a 1977 toilet and there have been a lot of improvements in toilet engineering since then. Quiet, flushes fast and refills fast, non-slamming lid works great, nice solid one piece construction, easy to clean. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Borel

customer_reviews.title: best toilet
customer_reviews.text: Best toilet we have ever owned and best company to buyfrom.....
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: ARIEL Platinum TB336M Contemporary European Toilet - White
product_meta.description: The Ariel Platinum TB336M Contemporary European Toilet is unlike any other. This one-piece design features clean edges and is a very modern version of the home toilet. The exhaust pipe is fully glazed, trap distance is 12 in. and the flush uses low water consuming out and out flushing technology.
feature_bullets: 12 in. rough in for easy standard installation
High quality glaze that resist stains and microbes
Seat is included with the toilet
